TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IJSRuntime

Docs.summary: Represents an instance of a JavaScript runtime to which calls may be dispatched.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<TValue> InvokeAsync<TValue> (string identifier, params object[] args);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<!!TValue> InvokeAsync<TValue>(string identifier, object[] args) cil managed
Public Function InvokeAsync(Of TValue) (identifier As String, ParamArray args As Object()) As Task(Of TValue)
abstract member InvokeAsync : string * obj[] -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<'Value>

Docs.param: An identifier for the function to invoke. For example, the value "someScope.someFunction" will invoke the function window.someScope.someFunction.
Docs.summary: Invokes the specified JavaScript function asynchronously.
Docs.returns: An instance of obtained by JSON-deserializing the return value.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask<TValue> InvokeAsync<TValue> (string identifier, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken, object[] args);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask`1<!!TValue> InvokeAsync<TValue>(string identifier, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken, object[] args) cil managed
Public Function InvokeAsync(Of TValue) (identifier As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken, args As Object()) As ValueTask(Of TValue)
abstract member InvokeAsync : string * System.Threading.CancellationToken * obj[] -> System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask<'Value>

Docs.param: An identifier for the function to invoke. For example, the value "someScope.someFunction" will invoke the function window.someScope.someFunction.
A cancellation token to signal the cancellation of the operation. Specifying this parameter will override any default cancellations such as due to timeouts () from being applied.
Docs.summary: Invokes the specified JavaScript function asynchronously.
Docs.returns: An instance of obtained by JSON-deserializing the return value.
